name: The Sand Man
storyline:
For days now, Sophie Grundler has been unable to sleep.
Bullied at school, and her father busy with work, she simply has to endure.
Then one night, the clock in her room stops ticking...
summary:
"I'll tell you a scary story. It's so scary you might not be able to take it. It's the story of the Sand Man..."
This is the second title in the Strange Man series. Unable to sleep and exhausted, Sophie wanders into a town where everything sleeps. That is where the terror begins...
